basics.name: Kathryn Nakagawa
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am an undergraduate student studying for a BS in Computer Science at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa, and have passed all the required classes to obtain a minor in Business. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

work.company: UH Manoa Kennedy Theater Costume Shop
work.summary: Seamstress that make costumes for the semester shows
highlights: Start and continue costume projects for upcoming performances
Maintain and upkeep the work area, machines, and inventory for the shop

work.summary: Assists ICS 101 students during their computer labs
highlights: Aid students during lab and office hours to ensure the people are keeping up with the class
Help any Assistant TAs with planning their lab activities

volunteer.summary: Matched with an elementary school student to help them with any school-related or extracurricular activities. Mentor activities ended due to the pandemic.
highlights: Often had to manage several kids when other mentors were absent
Aided in homework help and mentally stimulating activities to keep students entertained

volunteer.summary: Facilitate and plan out game jams for members to participate and learn about developing video games.
highlights: Plan and organize social events for the members to socialize and get to know one another as a team
Communicate with officers regarding scheduling, theme-planning, and keeping up with tasks to ensure projects are completed on time
